articles.author: Ellen Francis, Beatriz Ríos
articles.title: Spooked by Trump and Putin, Europe rushes to rearm - The Washington Post
articles.description: It’s a “turning of the page” as European leaders fast-track plans to bolster their militaries and back Ukraine — and ultimately curb dependence on the United States.
articles.content:
BRUSSELS The European Union, an entity thatcasts itself as a peace and trade project, is in crisis talks Thursday focused on defense.
Along with the specter ofabelligerent Moscow, President Donald T… [+7589 chars]
